sen.j: 古都京都の文化財（こときょうとのぶんかざい）は、京都府京都市・宇治市、滋賀県大津市に存在する寺院等の総称。
sen.e: "Historic Monuments of Ancient Kyoto" is a collective term of the temples in Kyoto City and Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture and Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.
"Historic Monuments of Ancient Kyoto" is a collective term of the temples in Kyoto City and Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture and Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.
"Historic Monuments of Ancient Kyoto" is a collective term of the temples in Kyoto City and Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture and Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 1994年に国際連合教育科学文化機関の世界遺産（文化遺産）として登録された。
sen.e: It was registered as World Heritage sites (cultural heritage) of United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) in 1994.
They were registered as World Heritage sites (cultural heritage) of United Nations Educational, Scientific, and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) in 1994.
They were registered as World Heritage sites (cultural heritage) of United Nations Educational, Scientific, and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) in 1994.

sen.j: 賀茂別雷神社 （上賀茂神社）
賀茂御祖神社 （下鴨神社）
具体的には、以下のとおりである。
sen.cmt: 「以下のとおりである。」を追記しました。

sen.j: （2） 京都は8世紀から17世紀の間、宗教・非宗教建築と庭園設計の進化にとって主要中心地であった。
sen.e: (2) Kyoto had been the center area in the development of religious and nonreligious architecture and garden planning from the 8th to the 17th centuries.
(2) Kyoto had been the center area in the development of religious and nonreligious architecture and garden planning from the 8th to the 17th centuries.
(2) Kyoto had been the center area in the development of religious and nonreligious architecture and garden planning from the 8th to the 17th centuries.

sen.j: そのように、京都は日本の文化的伝統の創出において決定的な役割を果たし、特に庭園の場合において、それは19世紀以降世界の他の地域において意義深い影響を与えた。
sen.e: Therefore, Kyoto had played the decisive role to create cultural tradition in Japan, and in specially in the area of gardening it had influenced the other regions of the world significantly after the 19th centuries.

Therefore, Kyoto had played the decisive role to create cultural tradition in Japan, and in especially in the area of gardening it had influenced the other regions of the world significantly after the 19th centuries.

Therefore, Kyoto had played the decisive role to create cultural tradition in Japan, and in especially in the area of gardening it had influenced the other regions of the world significantly after the 19th centuries.

sen.j: （4） 京都の現存文化財における建築と庭園設計の集積は前近代における日本の物質文化のこの側面に関する最高の表現である。
sen.e: (4) The concentration of architecture and gardening design in the existing cultural properties shows mostly this aspect of premodern Japanese material culture.
(4) The concentration of architecture and gardening design in the existing cultural properties shows mostly this aspect of premodern Japanese material culture.
(4) The concentration of architecture and gardening design in the existing cultural properties shows mostly this aspect of premodern Japanese material culture.

sen.j: 登録当時から時間が経過し周辺環境や景観の悪化が進行しつつあるため、京都市を中心に遺産の追加登録計画が持ち上がっている。
sen.e: As time passes from registration, the environment and the landscape has deteriorated, and consequently, a plan of additional registration of Heritage sites around Kyoto City is promoted.
As time passes from registration, the environment and the landscape has deteriorated, and consequently, a plan for additional registration of Heritage sites around Kyoto City is being promoted.
As time passes from registration, the environment and the landscape has deteriorated, and consequently, a plan for additional registration of Heritage sites around Kyoto City is being promoted.

sen.j: 具体的には、下記が登録に前向きの姿勢を示しており、京都市が京都御所、嵯峨野嵐山一帯の追加登録を目指している。
sen.e: In particular, following temples show the positive attitude, and the local government of Kyoto City aims the additional registration of Kyoto-gosho Palace and Sagano-Arashiyama area.
sen.cmt: 文にするために語順を変更しました。
sen.e: In particular, following temples show a positive attitude, the local government of Kyoto City aims at the additional registrations of Kyoto-gosho Palace and the Sagano-Arashiyama area.
In particular, following temples show a positive attitude, the local government of Kyoto City aims at the additional registrations of Kyoto-gosho Palace and the Sagano-Arashiyama area.

sen.j: また下記についても検討している。
sen.e: In addition, followings are also discussed.
